name: Winds of Destruction
uniques: [+1 Gold, +1 Production, +1 Food] from [all] tiles [in all cities]
[+2 Science] from [all] tiles [in all cities] <in tiles adjacent to [Mountain] tiles>
[+100]% unhappiness from the number of cities
[+100]% Unhappiness from [Population] [in all cities]
[+25]% growth [in all cities]
[1] Happiness from each type of luxury resource
Rebel units may spawn <after turn number [100]> <every [4] turns> <(modified by game speed)>
Rebel units may spawn <when below [0] Happiness> <every [5] turns>
[+2] Movement <for [Settler] units> <hidden from users>
[+2] Movement <for [Armored] units> <when at war>
[+2] Movement <for [Great General] units> <when at war>
[+33]% Production when constructing [Military] units [in all cities]
[+100]% [Production] [in all cities] <when below [-10] Happiness>
Gain a free [Stable] [in all cities] <hidden from users>
Gain a free [Workshop] [in all cities] <hidden from users>
Quantity of strategic resources produced by the empire +[100]% <for [City-State] Civilizations> <hidden from users>
[+33]% Strength <vs [Barbarian] units>
[+100]% XP gained from combat
Free [Settler] appears <hidden from users>
Free [Settler] appears <upon discovering [Sailing] technology> <hidden from users>
[2] free [Great General] units appear <upon declaring war with a major Civilization> <hidden from users>
[2] free [Scout] units appear <upon discovering [Sailing] technology> <hidden from users>
[1] free [Knight] units appear <upon discovering [Sailing] technology> <hidden from users>
Free Technology <upon conquering a city> <hidden from users>
declaringWar: I'M FUCKIN' INVINCIBLE!!!
attacked: Like I said, kids are cruel, Jack. And I'm very in touch with my inner child.
defeated: Son of a bitch...You...got me.

name: Genoa
uniques: [+20]% Yield from every [Coast]
[+20]% Yield from every [Ocean]
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: How barbaric. Those who live by the sword shall perish by the sword.

name: Kathmandu
uniques: [-50]% maintenance cost for buildings [in all cities]
[+20]% maintenance costs <for [Military] units>
[+2 Production, +2 Food, +2 Gold, +2 Culture, +2 Science] from every [Mountain]
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: We... defeated? No... we had so much work to do!

name: Singapore
uniques: [+2 Gold, +2 Production] from [Atoll] tiles [in all cities]
[+1 Food] from [Ocena] tiles [in all cities]
[+1 Food] from [Coast] tiles [in all cities]
Earn [15]% of the damage done to [All] units as [Gold]
Earn [15]% of the damage done to [All] units as [Culture]
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: Perhaps, in another world, we could have been friends...

name: Tyre
uniques: [2] free [Great Artist] units appear
[+2 Production, +3 Gold] from [Landmark] tiles [in all cities]
Starts with [Tradition] adopted
Starts with [Landed Elite] adopted
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: We never fully trusted you from the start.

name: Zanzibar
uniques: Provides [1] [Spices]
Provides [1] [Spices] <if [Gold] is constructed>
[+2 Production] from every [Stone]
[+2 Gold, +1 Food] from [Desert] tiles without [Flood plains] [in this city] <when above [2] [Spices]>
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: May the Heavens forgive you for inflicting this humiliation to our people.

name: Almaty
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: How could we fall to the likes of you?!

name: Belgrade
declaringWar: Let's have a nice little War, shall we?
attacked: If you need your nose bloodied, we'll happily serve.
defeated: The serbian guerilla will never stop haunting you!

name: Dublin
declaringWar: War lingers in our hearts. Why carry on with a false peace?
attacked: You gormless radger! You'll dine on your own teeth before you set foot in Ireland!
defeated: A lonely wind blows through the highlands today. A dirge for Ireland. Can you hear it?
uniques: Will not be displayed in Civilopedia
Will not be chosen for new games
Excluded from map editor

name: Edinburgh
declaringWar: You shall stain this land no longer with your vileness! To arms, my countrymen - we ride to war!
attacked: Traitorous man! The Celtic peoples will not stand for such wanton abuse and slander - I shall have your head!
defeated: Vile ruler, know that you 'won' this war in name only!
uniques: Will not be displayed in Civilopedia
Will not be chosen for new games
Excluded from map editor

name: M'Banza-Kongo
declaringWar: Do you really think you can walk over us so easily? I will not let it happen. Not to Kongo - not to my people!
attacked: We are no strangers to war. You have strayed from the right path, and now we will correct it.
defeated: You are nothing but a glorified barbarian. Cruel, and ruthless.

name: Sidon
uniques: [+50]% Production when constructing [All] units [in all cities] <hidden from users>
[-33]% Strength <for [All] units> <when fighting in [Enemy Land] tiles> <hidden from users>
All newly-trained [Military] units [in all cities] receive the [UcantSeeUs] promotion <hidden from users>
Rebel units may spawn <starting from the [Classical era]> <every [4] turns>
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: What a fine battle! Sidon is willing to serve you!

name: Valletta
uniques: [+25]% Production when constructing [All] units [in all cities]
Free [Spearman] appears <every [5] turns> <after discovering [Civil Service]>
[+2] Movement <for [Land] units> <when at war>
declaringWar: We don't like your face. To arms!
attacked: You will see you have just bitten off more than you can chew.
defeated: This ship may sink, but our spirits will linger.

name: Bratislava
declaringWar: I didn't want to do this. We declare war.
attacked: I will fear no evil. For god is with me!
defeated: Why have you forsaken us my lord?

name: Cahokia
declaringWar: We have wanted this for a LONG time. War it shall be.
attacked: Very well, we will kick you back to the ancient era!
defeated: This isn't how it is supposed to be!

name: Jerusalem
declaringWar: By god's grace we will not allow these atrocities to occur any longer. We declare war!
attacked: May god have mercy on your evil soul.
defeated: I for one welcome our new conquer overlord!

name: Brussels
declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
defeated: I guess you weren't here for the sprouts after all...

declaringWar: You leave us no choice. War it must be.
attacked: Very well, this shall not be forgotten.
